articles.title: Working People's Organizations Warn Park Geun Hye of Severest Punishment
articles.content:
Working People's Organizations Warn Park Geun Hye of Severest Punishment
 Pyongyang, October 17 (KCNA) -- The Joint National Association of Working People's Organizations made public a statement on Monday. They comprise the Central Committees of the Kimilsungist-Kimjongilist Youth League, the General Federation of Trade Unions of Korea, the Union of Agricultural Workers of Korea and the Democratic Women's Union of Korea.
					 Park Geun Hye of south Korea is taking the lead in escalating confrontation with the DPRK, telling all sorts of lies about it, not content with the smear campaign to stir up confrontation with the fellow countrymen, the statement said, and went on:
					
					 Recently, the traitor appeared at the "ceremony of commemorating the ROK army day", "the state council meeting" and various other events almost every day at which she let out a flurry of malignant invectives to create impression that something happened inside the DPRK with such rhetoric as "tyrannical policy" and "crack in social system."
					
					 The traitor went the lengths of predicting a lot of northerners will "defect" to south Korea not just in quest of means of living but under the name of immigration and expecting even those of elite circle to make their ways to it. 
					
					 She did not hesitate to spout such rubbish that south Korea would "greet them by keeping the door open so that they may pursue their dreams and happiness", describing it as a "cradle of freedom."
					
					 What she uttered is a crime against humanity as it is intended to hurt the life of the people in the DPRK and divide the great family under socialism and a last-ditch effort of a psychopath to "bring down" its social system and realize her foolish daydream of "unification through absorption."
					
					 Bitterly denouncing this in the name of all Koreans, the statement went on:
					
					 Her undisguised agitation of "defection" is little short of admitting herself that it is none other than Park herself who is chiefly to blame for the past hideous allurement and abduction operations against DPRK citizens.
					
					 This is no more than her hysteric fit to conceal the worst human rights situation in south Korea caused by her fascist crackdown and misrule and the eye-opening reality in which the DPRK has made a long drive despite her desperate moves.
					
					 She is busy agitating "defection" by pinning slight hope on the theory of "preemptive attack" spread by the U.S. as she is clinging to the coattails of her American master after being frightened by the DPRK's nuclear capability for self-defense. Nothing is more serious miscalculation than this.
					
					 As she revealed her ambition to achieve "unification through absorption", going beyond the tolerance limit, the working people of the DPRK solemnly declare an all-out sacred war to topple the corrupt, reactionary ruling system in south Korea and cut off the lifeline of the traitor.
					
					 The workers, peasants, youth and students and women in the DPRK will deal the most deadly hammer blows at Park Geun Hye and force her to pay the dearest price for the crimes she perpetrated against the Korean people.

articles.title: Commemorative Stamps for 90th Anniversary of DIU Produced
articles.content:
Commemorative Stamps for 90th Anniversary of DIU Produced 
 Pyongyang, October 17 (KCNA) -- The State Stamp Bureau of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea produced 2 kinds of commemorative stamps (one sheet and one individual stamp) on the occasion of the 90th anniversary of the Down-with-Imperialism Union (DIU).
					 Written at the top of the sheet on which President Kim Il Sung forming the DIU is portrayed are letters reading "90th Anniversary of DIU", "Juche 15 (1926)-Juche 105 (2016)".
					
					 Depicted on the individual stamp is the picture of imposingly standing Mt. Paektu against the background of a red flag bearing letters "DIU".

articles.title: Wreaths Laid before Revolutionary Martyrs Cemetery on Mt. Taesong
articles.content:
Wreaths Laid before Revolutionary Martyrs Cemetery on Mt. Taesong
 Pyongyang, October 17 (KCNA) -- Wreaths were laid before the Revolutionary Martyrs Cemetery on Mt. Taesong on Monday, the 90th anniversary of the formation of the Down-with-Imperialism Union.
					 Seen at the wreath-laying stand was a wreath sent by Kim Jong Un, chairman of the Workers' Party of Korea, chairman of the State Affairs Commission of the DPRK and supreme commander of the Korean People's Army.
					
					 Present at the wreath-laying ceremony were Kim Yong Nam, Hwang Pyong So, Choe Ryong Hae and senior officials of the party, state and army, the chairperson of a friendly party, officials of the party, armed forces and power bodies, Cabinet, working people's organizations, ministries and national institutions, service personnel of the Korean People's Army and the Korean People's Internal Security Forces and working people, youth and students in Pyongyang.
					
					 The participants laid bouquets and flowers before the bust of anti-Japanese war hero Kim Jong Suk and observed a moment's salience in memory of her.
					
					 Placed at the wreath-laying stand was a wreath in the joint name of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea, the State Affairs Commission of the DPRK, the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK and the Cabinet of the DPRK.
					
					 Also placed there were wreaths in the names of the armed forces organs, working people's organizations, ministries, national institutions, units of the Korean People's Army and the Korean People's Internal Security Forces, education, public health and media institutions and the party and power bodies, enterprises and farms in Pyongyang.
					
					 The participants observed a moment's silence in memory of the revolutionary martyrs before going round the cemetery.

articles.title: Tribute Paid to Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
Tribute Paid to Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il
 Pyongyang, October 17 (KCNA) -- Service personnel, people from all walks of life and school youths and children laid floral baskets, bouquets and flowers before the statues of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il on Monday, the 90th anniversary of the formation of the Down-with-Imperialism Union (DIU).
					 Lots of people visited the statues of the great leaders on Mansu Hill
					
					 Seen standing before the statues was a floral basket sent by Kim Jong Un, chairman of the Workers' Party of Korea, chairman of the State Affairs Commission of the DPRK and supreme commander of the Korean People's Army.
					
					 Placed before the statues were floral baskets in the names of the party, armed forces and power bodies, public organizations, ministries, national institutions, units of the Korean People's Army (KPA) and the Korean People's Internal Security Forces (KPISF) and institutions, factories, enterprises and schools in Pyongyang.
					
					 The masses made bows to the statues.
					
					 Placed before the statues of the great leaders and portraits of the smiling great leaders at Kim Il Sung University, the Ministry of the People's Armed Forces, the Mansudae Art Studio and other places in Pyongyang were floral baskets in the names of units of the KPA and KPISF, institutions and enterprises, and bouquets and flowers.
					
					 Service personnel, officials, working people and school youths and children across the country visited the statues of the great leaders and portraits of the smiling great leaders in their residential quarters.

articles.title: Dancing Parties of Youths and Students Held
articles.content:
Dancing Parties of Youths and Students Held
 Pyongyang, October 17 (KCNA) -- There took place in different parts of the country on Monday dancing parties of youths and students in celebration of the 90th anniversary of the formation of the Down-with-Imperialism Union (DIU) by President Kim Il Sung.
					 The dancing parties began at the plazas of the Arch of Triumph, the Pyongyang Indoor Stadium, etc, when song "Our People are Masters of Revolution" was played.
					
					 The participants presented beautiful dances with profound reverence for President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il who provided the bloodline of Juche, the eternal cornerstone of the Workers' Party of Korea, and add eternal luster to it.
					
					 Deep thanks and respect for Marshal Kim Jong Un could be read on the faces of the youngsters dancing to the tune of songs "Joy of the People", "the People's Country", etc. as he is steering to victory the revolutionary cause of Juche started under the banner of the DIU.
					
					 Festive atmosphere picked up when cheerful folk songs were played.
					
					 Similar dancing parties were also held in the provincial seats, cities and counties on the same day.

articles.title: Stages of Singing Revolutionary Songs of Youth and Students Held
articles.content:
Stages of Singing Revolutionary Songs of Youth and Students Held
 Pyongyang, October 17 (KCNA) -- Stages of singing revolutionary songs of youths and students for marking the 90th anniversary of the Down-with-Imperialism Union (DIU) formed by President Kim Il Sung took place across the country on Monday.
					 The stage of Pyongyang City "We Will Go to Mt. Paektu" was held at the plaza of the Monument to Party Founding. 
					
					 Put on the stage which began with chorus "We Will Go to Mt. Paektu" were such numbers as immortal masterpiece chorus "Nostalgia", female solo and chorus "Song of the Sea of Blood".
					
					 The performers highly praised the nine decade-long history of the Korean revolution since the formation of the DIU as proud annals in which the tradition and cause of the DIU have been preserved and comprehensively embodied generation after generation.
					
					 Such numbers as chorus "Song of Youth" vividly represented the faith and will of the young vanguard to carry forward and accomplish the revolutionary cause of Juche that originated from the DIU.
					
					 Among the spectators were officials of the youth league and youth and students in Pyongyang. 
					
					 Similar performances took place at all provinces.

articles.title: Drama "Blood Vessel" Staged
articles.content:
Drama "Blood Vessel" Staged
Pyongyang, October 17 (KCNA) -- A drama "Blood Vessel" was performed at the National Theatre on Monday, the 90th anniversary of the Down-with-Imperialism Union formed by President Kim Il Sung.
					 Among the audience were Kim Yong Nam and other senior party, state and army officials, the chairperson of a friendly party, officials of party and armed forces organ, Cabinet, working people's organizations, ministries and national institutions, service personnel of the Korean People's Army and the Korean People's Internal Security Forces, those of industrial establishments in Pyongyang and persons of merits.
					
					 The drama truthfully represented the indomitable mental power displayed by the workers of the Sangwon Cement Complex in the drive for implementing the task of increased cement production set forth by the Workers' Party of Korea.
					
					 It was acclaimed by the audience as it fully depicted the ideological and thematic contents of the work through a high level of narration, acting and realistic stage art.

articles.title: Foreign Guests Here
articles.content:
Foreign Guests Here
 Pyongyang, October 17 (KCNA) -- Delegates of the International Committee of the Red Cross, the International Federation of Red Cross and Red Crescent Societies and Red Cross Societies of Denmark, Finland and UK arrived here on Monday to take part in the Congress of the DPRK Red Cross Society and a meeting marking its 70th founding anniversary.

articles.title: Seminar on World Food Day Held
articles.content:
Seminar on World Food Day Held
 Pyongyang, October 17 (KCNA) -- A seminar on the 2016 World Food Day was held at the Grand People's Study House on Monday.
					 Present there were officials of the Ministry of Agriculture and other relevant units, the representative of the WFP, the deputy representative of the FAO and other members of missions of international organizations here, diplomatic envoys and officials of their embassies here.
					
					 Speakers said that the seminar on the theme of "Application of food and agriculture to cope with climate change" would offer a good occasion in taking measures to make sustainable development of agriculture and ensure food security.
					
					 They noted that the DPRK is directing primary efforts to settling the food problem of the people.
					
					 Many countries of the world are suffering food shortage due to the climate change, they pointed out, adding: In order to overcome this, it is necessary to develop agriculture and further strengthen cooperation with international organizations.
					
					 Speakers explained the phenomenon of the climate change in the DPRK and various other countries and practical measures in agriculture to cope with them.
					
					 The participants enjoyed an art performance given by Korean children.

articles.title: Global Handwashing Day Marked in DPRK
articles.content:
Global Handwashing Day Marked in DPRK
 Pyongyang, October 17 (KCNA) -- A meeting marking the Global Handwashing Day was held at the Mangyongdae Schoolchildren's Palace on Monday.
					 Present there were officials of the Education Commission, the Ministry of Urban Management and other relevant units, schoolchildren and teachers in Pyongyang and staff members of the UNICEF mission and other missions of international organizations here.
					
					 Speakers said that millions of children are suffering diarrhea and pneumonia every year worldwide, noting that handwashing in flowing water with soap plays a big role in preventing such diseases.
					
					 They underlined the need for all people to know well about the importance of handwashing of children, in particular, and its method and make it part of their life and habit.
					
					 Then followed an explanation titled "Let us make handwashing habit".
					
					 The participants watched schoolchildren's methods of handwashing and enjoyed an art performance given by hobby group members of the palace.

articles.title: Schoolchildren's Camping to Start in DPRK
articles.content:
Schoolchildren's Camping to Start in DPRK
 Pyongyang, October 17 (KCNA) -- The Songdowon International Children's Camp in the DPRK will soon start its service for schoolchildren from the flood-hit northern part of the country.
					 A brisk work was launched to make full preparations for those schoolchildren.
					
					 The Ministry of Railways prepared a direct train exclusive for the campers.

articles.title: Ugandan Delegation Leaves
articles.content:
Ugandan Delegation Leaves
 Pyongyang, October 17 (KCNA) -- An Ugandan delegation for the study of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism headed by Odauk Paul Michael, deputy commissioner of the National Secretariat for Patriotism Clubs Office of the President, left here for home on Monday.

articles.title: Sangwon Cement Complex Finishes Production of Cement for Disaster Areas
articles.content:
Sangwon Cement Complex Finishes Production of Cement for Disaster Areas
 Pyongyang, October 17 (KCNA) -- Great feats are being wrought in the flood damage rehabilitation of the DPRK.
					 The Sangwon Cement Complex over-fulfilled its cement production plan for the recovery efforts in the flood-hit northern part of the country.
					
					 On October 14, the train left the complex for the disaster areas, carrying its last batch of cement.

articles.title: Results of Housing Constuction in Flood-hit Areas of DPRK
articles.content:
Results of Housing Constuction in Flood-hit Areas of DPRK
 Pyongyang, October 17 (KCNA) -- The framework for thousands of flats was completed in Yonsa County, one of the flood-hit areas in northern part of the DPRK, only in tens of days.
					 Soldier-builders had carried out wall-building and floor concrete tamping ahead of schedule by tapping latent reserves and making a rational use of building equipment and vehicles.
					
					 Taking part in the recovery efforts there are also members of the Paektusan Hero Youth Shock Brigade, the 618 Shock Brigade and the South Hwanghae Provincial Waterway Construction Shock Brigade.
					
					 The housing construction in the county is now going on at a fast tempo.

articles.title: Production of Building Parts Goes up in DPRK
articles.content:
Production of Building Parts Goes up in DPRK
 Pyongyang, October 17 (KCNA) -- Factories under the Capital City Construction Commission of the DPRK are making a great progress in the production of building materials needed for recovery efforts in flood-hit North Hamgyong Province.
					 The Pyongyang Building Materials Factory, the Pyongyang Metallic Building Materials Factory and the Taesong Ceramic Factory have raised their production capacity twice by introducing new technical proposals.
					
					 As a result, the assignment for sanitary ware production was carried out in one month and that for plastic ventilator production in several days.

articles.title: Construction of Public Buildings in Flood-hit Hoeryong City of DPRK
articles.content:
Construction of Public Buildings in Flood-hit Hoeryong City of DPRK
 Pyongyang, October 17 (KCNA) -- A rapid progress has been made in the construction of public buildings in flood-hit North Hamgyong Province of the DPRK.
					 In Obong district of Hoeryong City, one of the flood-hit areas in the province, soldier-builders completed the framework for school with a total floor space of 6,000 square meters, kindergarten and clinic in a little over fifteen days after groundbreaking.
					
					 They are now speeding up the construction of public buildings with a goal to complete it by the end of this month.

articles.title: National Exhibition of IT Successes-2016 in DPRK
articles.content:
National Exhibition of IT Successes-2016 in DPRK
 Pyongyang, October 17 (KCNA) -- A national exhibition of IT successes-2016 recently took place in Pyongyang, the capital city of the DPRK.
					 According to Jon In Sok, head of a department of the General Bureau of National Software Industry, more than 1,000 pieces of IT successes and products were presented to the exhibition on the theme of "Self-development-first principle, enthusiasm for collectivist emulation and international competitiveness".
					
					 Taking part in the exhibition were not only scientists and technicians but also workers, clerks and students.
					
					 The ten best IT products, selected at the exhibition, include a program for video meeting developed by the IT Institute under Kim Il Sung University and an authentication system by the Pyongyang Information Technology Bureau.
					
					 Ri Kum Sun, an official of the General Bureau of National Software Industry, said that the general bureau will host the exhibition every year.

articles.title: KCNA Slams Chongwadae Witch's Call for "Diverse Sanctions" on DPRK
articles.content:
KCNA Slams Chongwadae Witch's Call for "Diverse Sanctions" on DPRK 
 Pyongyang, October 17 (KCNA) -- Recently Park Geun Hye of south Korea pressed a relevant ministries and agencies to take the initiative in slapping "diverse sanctions" against the DPRK.
					 At a "state council meeting" on Oct. 11 traitor Park gave instructions to take the initiative to slap "diverse sanctions" for putting substantial pressure on the north's regime, crying out for getting ready, being aware that its provocation is likely anytime and it may lead to actual contingency any moment.
					
					 This is nothing but a flurry of invective let out by the Chongwadae witch caught in an epileptic fit, taken aback by the tremendous nuclear might and stirring reality in the DPRK, and a desperate bid to divert elsewhere the public attention focused on her and tide over the serious ruling crisis.
					
					 The traitor is going reckless, seized by extreme horror and sense of setbacks, thrown into tailspin by the political and military superiorities of the DPRK.
					
					 The DPRK is standing as the most invulnerable fortress based on single-minded unity in the world.
					
					 It is an invincible power that has remained unperturbed by harsh sanctions and blockade imposed by the U.S. and its vassal forces for the last several decades and has won miraculous victories by turning adversity into favorable conditions despite such severe natural disasters as the flood damage in the northern part of the country.
					
					 The successful measures taken by it in recent years to modernize its nuclear weapons demonstrated the strongest will of its army and people to mount a counterattack on the enemies if they provoke it as they are part of the substantial counteractions to cope with the threat and sanctions of the U.S. and other hostile forces who malignantly slander the DPRK's exercise of its right to self-defence.
					
					 Park Geun Hye is not pleased with such great auspicious events of the nation and her fate is just like a candle flickering in the wind.  
					
					 No matter how desperately she may struggle to get out of her plight, the fate of the nation's top trouble-maker can not be otherwise as she turned south Korean society into a huge hell with her extreme political incompetence, and fascist, dictatorial and unpopular rule going against the times, pushed the north-south relations to a total deadlock and has brought the dark clouds of a nuclear war to hang over the Korean peninsula.
					
					 Much upset by the reality, the traitor is trying to get rid of the abyss of ruin with such racket as "diverse sanctions", but it will only precipitate her most miserable end as she invited the misfortune herself.

articles.title: Papers Call for Accomplishing Revolutionary Cause of Juche Originated from DIU
articles.content:
Papers Call for Accomplishing Revolutionary Cause of Juche Originated from DIU
 Pyongyang, October 17 (KCNA) -- Papers Monday dedicate editorials to mark the 19th anniversary of the Down-with-Imperialism Union (DIU) formed by President Kim Il Sung.
					 That the President formed the DIU on Oct. 17, Juche 15 (1926) was an event of great significance in providing the roots of the glorious Workers' Party of Korea and Juche revolution, carving out the destiny of the Korean people and accomplishing the human cause of independence, the papers say.
					
					 The DIU serves as the roots of the WPK, origin of Songun, model of the unity and banner of victory of the revolution, says Rodong Sinmun.
					
					 It goes on:
					
					 The DIU ushered in a new era of history and independence in which the popular masses carry out the revolution of their own countries independently and creatively with a firm hold on their own destiny.
					
					 The DIU is the torchlight that indicated the road of Songun for advancing the revolution on the principle of prioritizing the army and giving precedence to the military affairs for the first time in history.
					
					 Nine decade-long history of the Korean revolution that started from the DIU marked the shining course in which epochal reforms were made by overcoming all kinds of difficulties by dint of the single-minded unity.
					
					 The DIU's idea of continuous revolution and indomitable fighting spirit are being successfully carried forward by Marshal Kim Jong Un's indomitable and offensive revolutionary idea, steadfast revolutionary faith, pluck and fighting spirit.
					
					 We will travel along one road forever under the leadership of the great leader. This is the spirit of the DIU and eternal signpost of the Korean revolution.
					
					 Minju Joson calls upon all Koreans to carry on dynamic struggle to accelerate the final victory of the Korean revolution and of Juche revolution that originated from the DIU, rallied close around Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Blasts Park Geun Hye's Moves for Revival of "Yusin" System
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Blasts Park Geun Hye's Moves for Revival of "Yusin" System
 Pyongyang, October 17 (KCNA) -- "If one is to administer politics, one should have matchless courage like Hitler." blustered traitor Park Chung-Hee when ushering in the medieval fascist era of darkness in south Korea through the fabrication of the blood-stained "yusin constitution."
					 He proclaimed "emergency martial law" throughout south Korea at that time, dissolving the "National Assembly" and banned all political activities by mobilizing tanks and armored cars. Then he enacted the "yusin constitution."
					
					 Rodong Sinmun Monday in an article says that the establishment of the "yusin" system was an unpardonable political coup as the Park fascist junta turned south Korea into fascist rowdyism and a graveyard of human rights and democracy through the establishment of the long-term dictatorial system. 
					
					 The above-said dictatorial system converted south Korea into a horrible dark society and a huge prison without bars, the article notes, and goes on: 
					
					 Tragedy is that the south Koreans are now witnessing the departed soul of the revived "yusin" dictatorship though several decades have passed since the collapse of the "yusin" dictatorship there.
					
					 After seizing power, uttering "'October yusin' was an unavoidable best option," Park Geun Hye put the south Korean society under horrible fascist dictatorship, following in her father's footsteps.
					
					 She is betraying the dignity and interests of the nation, working with bloodshot eyes to stifle the north in collusion with outside forces after reneging on the agreements common to the nation just as the "yusin" dictator did.
					
					 Park Geun Hye refused to implement the historic June 15 joint declaration and October 4 declaration in tacit denial of them. This was little short of the huge crimes the "yusin" dictator committed by wantonly violating the July 4 joint statement. 
					
					 She is the worst traitor who offered south Korea as a theatre of fierce showdown among big powers by introducing U.S. THAAD and put the people's fate at stake to do harm to the compatriots in the north.
					
					 Park Geun Hye is fated to meet the same miserable doom as the "yusin" dictator's as she is swimming against the trend of the times and public mind-set.

articles.title: Despicable Nature of Unification Minister of S. Korea Disclosed
articles.content:
Despicable Nature of Unification Minister of S. Korea Disclosed
 Pyongyang, October 17 (KCNA) -- South Korean puppet Minister of Unification Hong Yong Phyo is busy noisily beating the drum for escalating confrontation with the fellow countrymen in the north to curry favor with Chongwadae witch. He is organizing "unification singing contest" and "unification cuisine show" with human scum and riff-raffs involved, stunning people and provoking their derision.
					 Rodong Sinmun Monday says in a commentary that chiefs of "Unification Ministry", the anti-unification mechanism, were replaced 37 times in nearly 50 years of its existence, but there was not such confrontation maniac and imbecile as Hong who does not feel ashamed of having pushed the north-south relations to a total collapse.
					
					 No wonder, Hong is called lackey and servant of Chongwadae, and fool and idiot and the Unification Ministry bossed by him has all kinds of disgraceful and shameful labels such as anti-unification ministry, division-freezing ministry, sanctions ministry, ministry of imbeciles and idiots.
					
					 It is quite natural for traitor Hong and the gentries of the Unification Ministry to be cursed and censured by the public.
					
					 For the past one and half years of his office Hong has committed more monstrous crimes than what other confrontation maniacs of the ministry did for the past several decades.
					
					 Hong is the most wicked servant and marionette of the Chongwadae boss without an equal.
					
					 Confrontation maniac and bete noire Hong will not be able to escape the most miserable end amid the bitter curse of the enraged public and all Koreans.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Ridicules S. Korean Puppet Forces for Soliciting for Cooperation in Stifling Fellow Countrymen
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Ridicules S. Korean Puppet Forces for Soliciting for Cooperation in Stifling Fellow Countrymen
 Pyongyang, October 17 (KCNA) -- Hwang Kyo An, puppet prime minister of south Korea, when meeting with the U.S. ambassador to the UN recently, solicited him for imposing new UN Security Council's "sanctions on the DPRK" and rendering "positive help in international cooperation" under the pretext of the DPRK's measures for bolstering up its self-defensive nuclear deterrence.
					 Traitor Yun Pyong Se, puppet foreign minister of south Korea, also discussed the close cooperation in rapidly making the UN Security Council adopt a "resolution on ratcheting up sanctions" against the DPRK and the cooperation in the anti-DPRK racket over what they call "human rights" with his American master.
					
					 Commenting on this, Rodong Sinmun Monday says that these are nothing but disgusting reckless actions of those hell-bent on escalating the confrontation with the fellow countrymen in the north, who desperately rely on foreign forces.
					
					 They begged for the above-said cooperation, serving the American, who is nothing but an ambassador of the U.S. as their savior, lost to all sense of shame. This is little short of a foolish act aimed at attaining the black-hearted ambition at any cost to make the north dismantle its nukes by ratcheting up the sanctions against it and tightening the pressure and blackmail further with the backing of the U.S.
					
					 No matter how frequently the south Korean puppet forces and the U.S. put their heads together to isolate and stifle the DPRK, it will bring them nothing but the whole nation's criticism and final ruin.
					
					 The Park Geun Hye group of traitors would be well advised to no longer ask for such cooperation but wait for the day when they will be tried by history.

articles.title: Japanese Authorities Denounced for Not Feeling Guilty of Sexual Slavery
articles.content:
Japanese Authorities Denounced for Not Feeling Guilty of Sexual Slavery 
 Pyongyang, October 17 (KCNA) -- There is a flurry of widespread protest of the international community demanding the apology and reparation for the sexual slavery committed by the Japanese imperialists in the past and also strong call even inside Japan demanding forwarding a letter of apology in the name of the prime minister to the victims.
					 Commenting on this, Japanese Prime Minister Abe noted that "no consideration is given" and "he has no intent to do so" at the Budget Committee of the House of Representatives in reference to the Japan-south Korea "agreement" adopted in December last year.
					
					 Minju Joson Monday in a commentary says that this proves once again before the world that the Japanese government authorities do not feel guilty at all of the past sexual slavery though it is branded as a hideous crime against humanity worldwide.
					
					 As for the issue of the sexual slavery for the Imperial Japanese Army, it was a serious human rights abuse because Japan trampled down in a massive and organized manner the chastity and dignity of tender women in Korea and in several other Asian countries during the Second World War and, therefore, apology and reparation are not something which allow one to shun them under an agreement with someone, the commentary notes, and goes on:
					
					 It is a bounden state duty and moral duty for Japan to properly settle the issue of the sexual slavery for the Imperial Japanese Army.
					
					 The people of victimized nation do not want the settlement of the issue devoid of apology and guilty conscience. It is because a paltry amount of money can never alleviate the bitter grudge and pain of the victims of the sexual slavery.
					
					 Japan is obliged to kneel down and make apology and honest reparation to the victims and the people of the victimized countries.
					
					 Japan must not forget even a moment that the world is following how it redeems its past crimes and that its future lies in whether it makes a bold decision to redress its past from sincere attitude and stand.

articles.title: S. Korean Public Transport Trade Union Stages Action in Protest against Retrogressive Revision of Labor Law
articles.content:
S. Korean Public Transport Trade Union Stages Action in Protest against Retrogressive Revision of Labor Law
 Pyongyang, October 17 (KCNA) -- The Public Transport Trade Union of south Korea held a meeting for all-out action against the retrogressive revision of the labor law and the system of forcible dismissal according to piece rate and for victory in the general strike at Youido in Seoul on Oct. 13, according to the south Korean internet paper Jaju Sibo. 
					 The Railway Trade Union, the Trade Union of the Hospital of the Seoul National University and the Finance Trade Union which have been on the general strike for three weeks also attended the meeting.
					
					 The participants in the meeting expressed their will to join in the general strike of public organs in order to check the retrogressive revision of the labor law sought by the Park Geun Hye regime. 
					
					 On the same day, the Public Transport Trade Union set up the venue of the strike outside the puppet government building and launched a sit-in strike.
					
					 The organization denounced the puppet authorities for working hard to suppress the struggle of workers and strongly demanded the regime opt for meeting its demands.

articles.title: Resumption of Artillery Firing Drill of Puppet Warmongers Denounced
articles.content:
Resumption of Artillery Firing Drill of Puppet Warmongers Denounced
 Pyongyang, October 17(KCNA) -- Inhabitants in Cholwon County, south Korea held a rally on Oct. 13 in protest against the resumption of artillery firing drill of the puppet warmongers, according to Yonhap News of south Korea.
					 The speakers said that the inhabitants have been exposed to dust and noise caused by the artillery firing drills for more than six decades.
					
					 One shell fell in the residential area during a recent artillery firing drill, letting dozens of shell splinters scatter in a village.
					
					 But the military authorities resumed the drill without taking any step.
					
					 The participants in the rally said that they would fight it out till the military authorities stop the drill.

articles.title: Joint Action against THAAD Deployment Held at S. Korean "National Assembly"
articles.content:
Joint Action against THAAD Deployment Held at S. Korean "National Assembly"
 Pyongyang, October 17 (KCNA) -- South Korean No-THAAD organizations including the Songju Committee for Struggle against THAAD Deployment, the Kimchon Citizens Measure Committee against THAAD Deployment, the Songju Emergency Measure Committee for Defending Holy Land of Won Buddhism, the Taegu-North Kyongsang Provincial Measure Committee against THAAD Deployment and the Action for Checking THAAD Deployment consisting of at least 100 civic and public organizations held the first joint press conference at the "National Assembly" on Oct. 14, according to a report.
					 The Songju Committee for Struggle against THAAD Deployment said that inhabitants in Songju would not stop the action together with Kimchon citizens and Won Buddhists till the day when THAAD is returned to the U.S.
					
					 The Kimchon Citizens Measure Committee against THAAD Deployment noted that it would struggle in solidarity with all citizens as THAAD deployment is not only the issue related to the relevant region but also the issue related to the whole of the Korean peninsula.
					
					 The Songju Emergency Measure Committee for Defending Holy Land of Won Buddhism demanded the "government" withdraw the decision on THAAD deployment and work hard for the denuclearization and peace of the Korean peninsula. It added that Won Buddhists would check THAAD deployment with all efforts at the risk of their lives.
					
					 The Action for Checking THAAD Deployment called upon all the people desirous of peace to kindle torchlight across south Korea on Oct. 20 all at once.

articles.title: U.S. Moves for Deploying THAAD in S. Korea under Fire
articles.content:
U.S. Moves for Deploying THAAD in S. Korea under Fire 
 Pyongyang, October 17 (KCNA) -- The special committee for checking THAAD deployment in south Korea and militarism in the Asia-Pacific region on Oct. 13 issued a statement signed by 46 organizations for peace against war and 15 personages all over the world, according to the south Korean on-line paper Voice of Seoul.
					 The statement said that the decision on THAAD deployment in south Korea will further expand the U.S. missile defense system as it is part of the U.S. Asia-Pacific policy.
					
					 The U.S. decision will escalate the military tension and fan up the arms race in the Asia-Pacific region, increase the possibility of a new war on the Korean peninsula and quell the ardent desire of the south Korean people for independence and democracy, it held.
					
					 It demanded the U.S. cancel the decision on THAAD deployment in south Korea and make all efforts to defuse the tension on the Korean peninsula.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un's Work Published in Spain
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un's Work Published in Spain
 Pyongyang, October 17 (KCNA) -- Supreme leader Kim Jong Un's work "Making Selfless, Devoted Efforts for the Good of the People is the Mode of Existence and Source of Invincible Might of the Workers' Party of Korea" was brought out in booklet by the Anfer Publishing House of Spain on October 6 on the occasion of the 71st founding anniversary of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK).
					 The work, published on October 10, Juche 104 (2015), says that the history of the WPK is a proud course in which it has led the Korean revolution to victory, being responsible for the people's destiny under the guidance of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un's Work Published in Laos
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un's Work Published in Laos
 Pyongyang, October 17 (KCNA) -- Supreme leader Kim Jong Un's work "To Protect National Heritage Is a Patriotic Undertaking for Adding Brilliance to the History and Traditions of Our Nation" was published in booklet by the Lao State Publishing House on October 7 on the occasion of the 71st founding anniversary of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK).
					 The work, published on Oct. 24, Juche 103 (2014), says that President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il attached importance to the protection of national heritage and directed efforts to it in the whole course of leading the revolution, thus demonstrating the time-honored history and glorious culture of the Korean nation before the world.
					
					 It clarifies the tasks to be fulfilled to preserve the undying exploits of the great leaders and add luster to the history and tradition of the Korean nation by thoroughly implementing the policy of protecting the national heritage set forth by the WPK.

articles.title: Founding Anniversary of WPK Observed in Thailand
articles.content:
Founding Anniversary of WPK Observed in Thailand
 Pyongyang, October 17 (KCNA) -- There took place lectures and film shows in Thailand from October 6 to 10 to mark the 71st founding anniversary of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK).
					 Present at the events were personages of the Thai preparatory committee for 2017 Meeting Praising Great Persons of Mt. Paektu, the Thailand-Korea Friendship Association, Rajabat Pranakorn University and some companies of Thailand and masses.
					
					 Films shown included the Korean films "Grand Celebration of 70th Founding Anniversary of Workers' Party of Korea in Presence of Respected Comrade Kim Jong Un", "Flag of WPK" and "Okryu Children's Hospital."
					
					 The chairman of the Thailand-Korea Friendship Association said:
					
					 HE Kim Il Sung, the eternal President of the DPRK, founded the WPK on October 10, 1945.
					
					 Hammer, sickle and writing brush are depicted on the red flag of the WPK.
					
					 This helps one know well that the WPK is the revolutionary party representing the working masses.
					
					 The WPK further developed into a popular revolutionary party under the wise leadership of HE Kim Jong Il.
					
					 The Korean people are highly praising the WPK as a motherly party.
					
					 The exploits President Kim Il Sung and HE Kim Jong Il performed by founding and strengthening the WPK will shine forever.

articles.title: Founding Anniversary of WPK Observed Abroad
articles.content:
Founding Anniversary of WPK Observed Abroad
 Pyongyang, October 17 (KCNA) -- There took place celebrations, friendly meetings, photo, book and handcraft exhibitions and film shows in Bulgaria, Mexico, DR Congo, Nepal and Cambodia from October 3 to 10 to mark the 71st founding anniversary of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK).
					 On display at the venues of the events were photos of President Kim Il Sung, leader Kim Jong Il and Marshal Kim Jong Un.
					
					 Also displayed there were their works and books and photos introducing the DPRK and handcrafts associated with wisdom and talents of the Korean people.
					
					 Films shown included the Korean films "Grand Celebration of 70th Founding Anniversary of Workers' Party of Korea in Presence of Respected Comrade Kim Jong Un" and "My Country Has Emerged Victorious by Dint of Single-minded Unity."
					
					 The chief the Bulgarian Group for the Study of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism said the DPRK has turned into a socialist country independent in politics, self-supporting in economy and self-reliant in national defence under the experienced guidance of the WPK.
					
					 The chairman of the Mexican Committee for the Study of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism and the chairman of the Mexico-Korea Friendship Association praised the exploits Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il performed by building and leading the party, saying the army and people of the DPRK have firmly defended the sovereignty and dignity of the country under the uplifted banner of Songun.
					
					 The chairman of the Group for Study of Songun Policy in Bandundu University said the history of the WPK precisely means the glorious revolutionary histories of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il and the history of successfully steering the drive for defending socialism and the cause of human independence.

articles.title: Publicada declaracion del Conjunto Nacional de Organizaciones de Masas
articles.content:
Publicada declaracion del Conjunto Nacional de Organizaciones de Masas
Pyongyang, 17 de octubre (ACNC) -- El Conjunto Nacional de Organizaciones de Masas, compuesto por los comites centrales de la Union de la Juventud Kimilsungista-Kimjongilista, la Federacion General de los Sindicatos de Corea, la Union de Trabajadores Agricolas de Corea y la Union de Mujeres Democraticas de Corea, hizo publica el dia 17 una declaracion que sigue:
					En estos dias, la mandataria surcoreana Park Geun-hye, enloquecida por el enfrentamiento fratricida, pronuncia personalmente los chismes de toda indole sobre la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea. 
					
					Al asistir casi todos los dias a la "ceremonia conmemorativa del Dia de las Fuerzas Armadas", la "reunion del consejo de ministros" y otras ocasiones, ella habla como si en el interior de la RPDC ocurriera algun caso de emergencia usando expresiones como la "politica de represion violenta" y "agrietamiento del regimen". 
					
					Anuncia el exodo al Sur de Corea diciendo que la "fuga del Norte pasa de la forma de supervivencia a la de emigracion" y "se escapan hasta las personas de la clase elite". 
					
					Describiendo la corrupta sociedad surcoreana como "terreno de libertad", chismea que "recibiran a los fugitivos norcoreanos dejandoles abiertas todas las vias para que ellos puedan perseguir sus suenos y la vida feliz". 
					
					Condenamos esa chismografia en nombre de todo el pueblo coreano calificandola de crimen antietico encaminado a insultar la vida del pueblo coreano y romper la gran familia socialista de la RPDC y de ultimo pataleo de la psicopata que trata de realizar su absurda ambicion de "unificacion mediante la absorcion" al "derrocar" el regimen socialista de la parte connacional. 
					
					Al agitar abiertamente la "fuga del Norte", Park reconocio por si misma que es la autora principal de los horribles casos de secuestro a los moradores norcoreanos que se han reportado hasta la fecha. 
					
					Esa agitacion no pasa de ser una locura para ocultar la critica situacion de DDHH del Sur de Corea creada por la dominacion fascista y las politicas antipopulares de la traidora y tergiversar la realidad maravillosa de la RPDC que sale siempre victoriosa sin vacilacion alguna ante los desesperados movimientos de los titeres surcoreanos. 
					
					Seria muy equivocada si Park, atemorizada ante el poderio de las fuerzas armadas nucleares de autodefensa de la RPDC, abriga un hilo de esperanza en el rumor de "ataque preventivo" proveniente de EE.UU. 
					
					Puesto que ella expone en publico su ambicion de "unificacion mediante la absorcion", declaramos con solemnidad que nuestras masas trabajadoras entran en la sagrada lucha de todo el pueblo para acabar con el reaccionario regimen surcoreano y eliminar a esa traidora. 
					
					Nuestros obreros, campesinos, jovenes y mujeres daran el castigo mas duro a la traidora Park, que dejo de ser humana, y le haran pagar de manera mas horrorosa sus crimenes cometidos contra nuestro pueblo.

articles.title: Rinden homenaje a martires antijaponeses en dia de constitucion de la UDI
articles.content:
Rinden homenaje a martires antijaponeses en dia de constitucion de la UDI 
Pyongyang, 17 de octubre (ACNC) -- Con motivo del 90o aniversario de la constitucion de la Union para Derrotar al Imperialismo por el Presidente Kim Il Sung, fueron depositadas este lunes las ofrendas florales ante el Cementerio de Martires Revolucionarios en el Monte Taesong.
					Alli estaba colocada una ofrenda floral enviada por Kim Jong Un, Presidente del Partido del Trabajo de Corea y del Comite de Estado de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y Comandante Supremo del Ejercito Popular de Corea. 
					
					En la ceremonia de homenaje participaron Kim Yong Nam, Hwang Pyong So, Choe Ryong Hae y otros cuadros directivos del Partido, el Estado y el ejercito, el presidente de partido amigo, los funcionarios de los organismos del partido, las fuerzas armadas y el poder, el Consejo de Ministros, entidades de masas, ministerios y organos centrales, los oficiales y soldados del Ejercito Popular de Corea y del Ejercito de Seguridad Interior del Pueblo de Corea, trabajadores, jovenes y estudiantes de la capital. 
					
					Los participantes guardaron un momento de silencio en memoria de la Heroina de la Lucha Antijaponesa Kim Jong Suk tras colocar los ramos y ramitas de flores ante el busto de esta generala del monte Paektu. 
					
					Fueron colocadas una ofrenda floral a nombre comun del Comite Central del PTC, el Comite de Estado de la RPDC, el Presidium de la Asamblea Popular Suprema de la RPDC y el Consejo de Ministros de la RPDC, y las otras a nombre de los organismos de las fuerzas armadas, entidades de masas, ministerios, organos centrales, unidades del EPC y del Ejercito de Seguridad Interior del Pueblo de Corea, instituciones de educacion, salud publica y prensa, organismos del partido y el poder, empresas, granjas, etc. de la capital. 
					
					Los participantes guardaron un momento de silencio en memoria de los martires revolucionarios y recorrieron el  Cementerio.

articles.title: Abierto seminario por Dia Mundial de Alimento de 2016
articles.content:
Abierto seminario por Dia Mundial de Alimento de 2016
Pyongyang, 17 de octubre (ACNC) -- Tuvo lugar el dia 17 en el Palacio de Estudio del Pueblo el seminario dedicado al Dia Mundial de Alimento de 2016.
					En la ocasion estuvieron presentes los funcionarios del Ministerio de Agricultura y otras unidades relacionadas, el representante del Programa Mundial de Alimento, el vice-representante de la Organizacion de las Naciones Unidas para la Agricultura y la Alimentacion (FAO) y otros miembros de las representaciones de organizaciones internacionales, asi como los representantes diplomaticos de varios paises y los miembros de embajadas extranjeras, acreditados en Corea.
					
					Los oradores dijeron que el presente simposio, abierto con el tema "Adaptacion de alimento y agricultura frente al cambio climatico", servira de buena oportunidad para tomar las medidas encaminadas a asegurar el desarrollo sostenible de la agricultura y la seguridad alimentaria.
					
					Se refirieron a que la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea presta atencion primordial a la solucion del problema alimentario del pueblo.
					
					Senalaron que muchos paises del mundo sufren la crisis de alimento debido al cambio climatico y para superarla, deben desarrollar la agricultura y fortalecer la cooperacion con las organizaciones internacionales.
					
					A continuacion, hubo intervenciones bajo los titulos de "Aplicacion del cambio climatico en la agricultura", "Sobre la disminucion del peligro de desastre en la rama agricola", "Correlacion entre la seguridad alimentaria y la nutricion infantil", etc.
					
					Los seminaristas explicaron los fenomenos del cambio climatico observados en la RPDC y otros paises del mundo y las medidas practicas del sector agricola para hacerles frente.
					
					Los participantes vieron una funcion artistica de ninos coreanos.
